Vitei - Kyoto Japan http://www.vitei.com

Vitei Inc. is a video game company that works closely with Nintendo to produce games such as Steel Diver, which we produced in close co-ordination with Shigeru Miyamoto, Tadashi Sugiyama and Takaya Imamura.

We are currently hiring programmers! Strong C/C++/C# essential. Scripting languages a bonus. Graduates/early career applications welcome.

Further details about this job listing can be found here: http://vitei.com/jobs/
